modName: Hidden Skulls of the Forgotten Legends
summary: Halo style skull hunt, 10 unique looking enchanted and equippable skulls with books placed in several locations with clues on how to find them.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

10 skulls of the forgotten legends have been hidden throughout Skyrim, which can actually be equipped and will grant unique powers.  For now the skulls aren\'t visible when equipped but I will work on that, but the point of the mod is the hunt and reward anyway.  
Here is the list,

Skulls to find:

1) Skull of the Phantom

-Fortify sneak 10 pts
-Muffle 5 pts
-Become Ethereal

2) Skull of Drelas

-Stamina regenerates 50% faster
-If undead, resist magicka 50%
-If undead, resist damage 20%

3) Skull of the Storm Chaser

-Fortify destruction 20 pts
-Resist 50% of shock damage

4) Skull of Efficiency

-Fortify speechcraft 15 pts
-Fortify smithing 15 pts

5) Steel Skull of the Hoplite

-Fortify heavy armour 20 pts
-Fortify block 20 pts

6) Skull of the Firewalker

-Fortify destruction 20 pts
-Resist 50% fire damage

7) Skull of Frostbite

-Resist 50% frost damage
-Glacial cloak, a constant ice cloak spell

8) Skull of the City Swimmer

-Run faster
-Waterbreathing

9) Skull of the Watcher

-Light self
-Fortify Archery 20 pts

10) Skull of the Spriggan

-Fortify Restoration 15 pts
-Fortify Conjuration 15 pts
-Resist Disease 50%

I have placed books in the game (same one in different locations) which will give decriptive clues from the perspective of the skull which should help you locate them.  You will know when you see them and they are not hidden away (HINT: There is definately one in Whiterun).


Installation:

Unpack the files to your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data, delete the bsa and esp to uninstall.


Credits:

Dogtown1 for making the skull mesh and base texture
The skull was taken from my SkyrimMoMod Additions - New Items mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14767
which requires Skyrim Monster Mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9694
